content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the requested function in Julia:

```julia
function wrap_string(s, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(s, ' ')
    result = ""
    line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(line * " $word") > text_width
            result *= "$line\n"
            line = ""
        end
        line *= " $word"
    end
    result *= "$line"
    return result
end
```

Here is an example usage:

```julia
s = "This is a test string. It will be wrapped to fit within the specified width."
println(wrap_string(s, 15))
```

The output of this code would look like this:

```
"This is a test 
string. It will 
be wrapped to 
fit within the 
specified width."
```
